message_1:
A delivery company has 5 packages to deliver in a certain area. The company wants to find the most efficient route to visit all the delivery locations and return to the starting point. The distance (in miles) between each location is given in the table below. What is the shortest possible distance of such a route?

| Location | A | B | C | D | E |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| A | 0 | 3 | 4 | 2 | 1 |
| B | 3 | 0 | 6 | 7 | 3 |
| C | 4 | 6 | 0 | 5 | 8 |
| D | 2 | 7 | 5 | 0 | 9 |
| E | 1 | 3 | 8 | 9 | 0 |
